content.rendered:
Hikvision 2MP Network Dome Camera 2.8mm

Hikvision DS-2CD1121-I 2MP Network Dome Camera 2.8MM

excerpt.rendered:
• 2.8 mm fixed focal lens, Up to 30 m IR range
  • 1/2.8? progressive scan CMOS, Up to 2.0 megapixel, Vandal Proof
  • Dual stream, Digital WDR (Wide Dynamic Range)
  • 3D DNR (Digital Noise Reduction), PoE (Power over Ethernet), IP67, IK10
